original_title: Kraniebrud - eller 'er du ikke lidt for ung til at optegne dine erindringer?'
overview: Skull Fracture or ‘Aren’t You Rather Young to be Writing Your Memoirs?’ is a story that emerges and crashes within the narrow, inventive, and organic confines of the memory. A story about a skull that breaks and needs healing. How do we see an experience in the light of another? How do we see the other in the light of the new? And does it all even make sense?
title: Skull Fracture or 'Aren't You Rather Young to Be Writing Your Memoirs?'
